## üí¨ Click and Highlight 

üì∏ Opens the quick capture bar. Select the option of capture. In this case the second button.

üñçÔ∏è Highlight a specific part of your screen by clicking right and using the highlight pen.

üñ±Ô∏è It‚Äôs ideal for capturing a specific detail or section you want to share with your team.

‚å®Ô∏è You can also use ALT + A for a quicker way to do it.

<div class="relative box-content w-full max-h-[80vh] aspect-[1.90476] py-10">
  <iframe
    src="https://app.supademo.com/embed/cmj91kle40b42f6zpatkvjss2?embed_v=2&utm_source=embed"

  ></iframe>
</div>


### üí° Tips

* Use the quick access shortcut by Pressing ALT + A to open the capture tool instantly and highlight what matters without breaking your workflow.

* Highlight only the important areas of your screen to keep your message clear and easy to understand.

* Right-click and drag with the highlight pen to mark the exact section you want to emphasize.

* Add a brief note or comment after capturing to provide context and avoid confusion.
